title: Codification of ZK Corrective Heuristics
author: Engineer (apnex)
description: Mechanisms to preventing ZK entities from simulating Director authority.

components.name: Induction Halt
components.concept: Modify engine/onboard.js to stop after the briefing, requiring the entity to query the Oracle for PRIME_DIRECTIVES before proceeding to Orientation.

components.name: Turing Gate Handshake
components.concept: A session-based token generated by onboard.js and served by oracle.js that must be provided back to onboard.js to unlock the project orientation, ensuring the entity has 'read' the directives.

components.name: Warden Source Enforcement
components.concept: Modify 'engine/warden.js' to REJECT any log entry containing 'DLR_' if the source is 'manual_echo' or 'agent_exec'.
